title: Meaning of Eurofurence font
content:
Does anyone know the meaning or origin of the typeface EUROFURENCE? I would like to talk about it in a meeting I have today. Thanks!

 [‹ 13 em(s) ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208115242/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15300 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ragged-right on 8.5x11; to indent or leave extra leading? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208115242/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15123 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Erin A. McCabe

comments.content:
[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eurofurence](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208115242/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eurofurence "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eurofurence")

I’m assuming it’s connected to the Furry Convention of the same name.  
Tim
